woooohooooo nekkid investigations! Im game =3Dp

--- On Tue, 11/2/10, Frank=
 Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


From: Frank Sumption <purple=
aliengirl@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] For the "pure EVP" enthusiast
To: E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, RTSC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, November 2, 201=
0, 8:30 AM


=C2=A0 




=C2=A0Such as those that think real EVP can only b=
e received using white noise might want to do some real research starting w=
ith natural radio and what are call spherics and whistlers, or pulses gener=
ated by lightening and other "natural" EMF sources. Some,=C2=A0 will no dou=
bt claim=C2=A0their system operates at such a high frequency that it can no=
t get the low frequency EMFs of natural radio--wrong again. This stuff cove=
rs the whole the spectrum from DC to light, and those little whispers are=
=C2=A0mostly just RF noise from natural and man made sources, you can even =
get=C2=A0the noise from big planets, here on Earth, from Jupiter and Saturn=
.=C2=A0 Get a sound=C2=A0 that might seem like singing and I am pretty sure=
 it's just what is called a "whistler", probably from terrestrial lightenin=
g. The thunderstorm can be anywhere, this stuff propagates just like radio,=
 and there are hundreds of thunderstorms all over the planet at any given m=
oment.=C2=A0 Everytime an electric motor starts, or
 a florescent light, or=
 a car starts, anything that uses electricity, there is going to be a magne=
tic field radiated.=C2=A0 How many electric lights are in the world going o=
n and off!?=C2=A0 How about in a factory, large shop, lab, or manufacturing=
/research facility?Lots and lots of magnetic/electric pulses.
=C2=A0
=C2=A0=
Then, to make it worse, people claim be touched during investigations might=
 want to investigate static electricity!=C2=A0 Clothes generate electric fi=
elds as we move around, normally it goes unnoticed, but=C2=A0moving around=
=C2=A0in the dark listening and feeling for anything, you might think you'r=
e being touched, or your clothes moved. Could it be just the static electri=
city causing attraction and/or repulsion of areas of clothing?=C2=A0 I'm no=
t saying that's what it is. Just be sure, and to get the pure=C2=A0experien=
ce, I think all ghost investigations should be done naked to eliminate all =
static electricity from clothing. :-O 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I know, sounds like deb=
unking, but ya have to stop and think sometimes.=C2=A0 Some of these effect=
s we feel and hear can be caused by natural magnetic and electric sources. =
Then, make it worse cuz we can create, via thought forms, just what we want=
 to experience. One must control one's emotions! 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0There are=C2=
=A0some that have established themselves as experts based on white noise EV=
P. To maintain position they may claim only white noise EVP is acceptable a=
nd pure.=C2=A0 What is white noise? A frikkin' raw audio in it's simplest f=
orm, so why not use higher level sounds and get higher level voices? When y=
ou get voices giving names, answering questions, and even cussing and swear=
ing, I am pretty sure "the box" as it's come to be=C2=A0known beats the be-=
geeesies out of white noise BS. Yes, you can get broadcast fragments, and b=
its that can be mistaken, but with white noise, you can get all kinds of we=
ak noise pulses that probably say nothing, but you are desperately trying t=
o interpret. It's been my experience that the more one filters and cleans a=
 recording, the more these noises sound intelligible. If you have to filter=
 it just to hear if it is saying anything--forget about it!=C2=A0 I think o=
ur own minds and psi ability--can--- influence the sounds and create a
 mea=
ning where there was none. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Spirit exists in a higher dimensio=
n, as such they have full access to our level and can easily manipulate sou=
nd and everything else. We are limited, they are not. That's why I focus on=
 higher level, more energetic phenomenon and ignore stuff like white noise =
EVP or orbs. Paranormal experience is more dictated by what one can accept =
than anything else,=C2=A0 by what one fears as well. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0W=
ait=C2=A0for it! Wait for it! Here it comes-- the threats of law suits and =
how dare you question......
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Am I an expert--hell no, ex=3D=3D=
=3Dhas been, 'spert=3D=3Ddrip under pressure.=C2=A0I don't want to be a "pa=
ranormal expert" 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S
